item.title: Episode 1: The one with Nora Jones
item.description:
Notes:

Our special guest Nora Jones and our host Casey Rosenthal are the two authors of O’Reilly’s Chaos Engineering: System Resilincy in Practice, the definitive book on the subject. We ask Nora about learning from incidents, how to facilitate a healthy Chaos Engineering program, the path that led to her writing this book with Casey, how her thinking has changed over the years, and her startup Jeli.
